about_the_game:
A slight buzzing in the distance, gusts of air whistling through the gaps between the walls, and a soft warm glow of sunlight. These are the first things Emma notices as she slightly comes back to consciousness. She looks around, her vision still blurry, and finds herself waking up on a dusty and bloody bed in a room she's never seen before. The room's made of wooden panels, with patches of mould on them and cobwebs in the corners.

How did she get here? Why is going on a solo road trip the last thing she remembers? Did she get kidnapped?

Numerous questions fill up in Emma's head as she tries to look for clues and piece together the events that led to her current situation. But along with these questions are also thoughts of fear. A fear of the unknown. A chilling sense of dread that even if this place looks abandoned, she certainly doesn't feel like she's alone.

  • Explore a dark and abandoned wooden log house with a unique and eerie design
  • Uncover the history of the house by reading through letters or drawings scattered among the rooms
  • Experience disturbing images and visions as you try to figure out what's real and what's a hallucination
  • Find the right tools to help yourself escape the labyrinth

She looks around, her vision still blurry, and finds herself waking up on a dusty and bloody bed in a room she's never seen before. Numerous questions fill up in Emma's head as she tries to look for clues and piece together the events that led to her current situation. But along with these questions are also thoughts of fear. name: Blinding Oversight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible

short_description: You play as Emma, who wakes up in an abandoned house without any prior memory of how she ended up there. Investigate your surroundings, uncover the mysteries of the house and connect memories from your past in this first person atmospheric horror game.
